column1: SARPI Real personal income and real personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) by state
SARPI Real personal income and real personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) by state

1. Real personal income for states is personal income divided by the RPPs and the national PCE price index. The result is a constant dollar (using 2017 as the base year) estimate of real personal income. Calculations are performed on unrounded data.
Last updated: December 12, 2024-- new statistics for 2023; revised statistics for 2019-2022.
